Description: Bare headed bust of Hadrian, right, draped. (obverse)
Alexandria, draped, reclining left, holding corn-ears and poppy in right hand and vine-branch in left, resting left arm on basket of fruit: to left, three corn-ears growing. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Bibliographic references: Strack (Hadrian) / Die Reichspraegung zur Zeit des Hadrian (711)
RIC2 / The Roman imperial coinage, vol. 2: Vespasian to Hadrian (844, p.446)
RIC2.3 / The Roman Imperial Coinage, vol. II - part 3 from AD 117-138 Hadrian (1629)
